items.title: Gemini AI can now turn photos into videos
Nintendo Ends Switch Game Vouchers
items.author: Emma Roth
items.summary:
* Nintendo is discontinuing the game voucher program for the Switch, effective January 30, 2026. 
* Originally introduced in 2019, these vouchers allowed players to save on digital game purchases, especially for titles priced at $59.99. 
* Following this decision, players can no longer earn discounts through Nintendo's My Nintendo Gold Points loyalty program, raising concerns about future savings options.

items.title: Inside the AI startup frenzy: ‘Everyone’s pivoting, then pivoting again’
items.author: Alex Heath
items.summary:
- This episode of *Decoder* features Ellis Hamburger, founder of *Meaning*, discussing how AI startups present their products.
- The conversation touches on themes of **pivoting** in the chaotic startup landscape.
- Hamburger provides unique insights, drawing from his experiences in the AI industry and his past at *The Verge*.

items.title: Dreame’s X40 Ultra: Mopping Vacuum Deal
items.author: Sheena Vasani
items.summary:
- The **Dreame X40 Ultra** is a powerful robot vacuum and mop hybrid, now **$800 off** at $699.99 for Prime Day.  
- It features *12,000Pa suction power* and dual oscillating mops that clean carpets and hard floors effectively, even under furniture.  
- This model is low-maintenance with self-cleaning capabilities for mop pads and dustbin, making it an excellent choice for hassle-free cleaning.

items.title: 58 Prime Day Deals Under $50
items.author: Brandon Russell
items.summary:
- This article highlights *58 amazing deals* available during Prime Day, specifically for items priced at **$50 or less**.
- Shoppers can find discounts on **speakers**, earbuds, smart home gadgets, and other tech accessories.
- With competing offers from retailers like Walmart and Best Buy, consumers have more *affordable options* to choose from during the sales event.

items.title: Best Prime Day Gaming Deals 2025
items.author: Brandt Ranj
items.summary:
- Take advantage of *massive savings* on games, controllers, and accessories this Prime Day. 
- Featured deals include discounts on *Star Wars Outlaws* and *Splatoon 3*, among others. 
- Explore the best *gaming hardware* deals, like discounts on the Meta Quest 3S headset.

items.title: Dissident Hunters
Lego’s First Buildable Decepticon: Soundwave
items.author: Andrew Liszewski
items.summary:
- Lego introduces its first Decepticon Transformer, *Soundwave*, featuring 1,505 pieces and standing nearly 13 inches tall.
- This set includes an *electronic sound brick* for voice and sound effects, creating an immersive experience for fans.
- Additionally, it features buildable versions of *Ravage* and *Laserbeak*, transforming into cassette tapes fitting into Soundwave’s chest compartment.

items.title: Nintendo's Destructive Adventure in Donkey Kong Bananza
items.author: Ash Parrish
items.summary:
- *Donkey Kong Bananza* emphasizes a gameplay style focused on *destruction*, allowing players to break various objects in innovative ways.  
- The advanced *voxel technology* enables persistent environmental destruction, making the game experience unique and engaging.  
- With sidekick *Pauline*, players experience new mechanics, including music-driven transformations that enhance play dynamics.

items.title: The best Prime Day deals on Verge-favorite 4K Blu-rays
The Brutal Realities of ICE Air
items.author: Darryl Campbell
items.summary:
- The *ICE Air* operation has quietly expanded under the Trump administration, moving tens of thousands of detainees swiftly and with brutal efficiency. 
- Deportees face *inhumane conditions* and allegations of abuse during flights, highlighting a lack of oversight and transparency. 
- With a planned increase in budget and deportations, ICE's air division is set to expand further, continuing methods reminiscent of *CIA extraordinary rendition* flights.

items.title: X’s CEO is out after failing at basically everything she claimed she wanted
YouTube Clarifies Demonetization Plans for AI Content
items.author: Jess Weatherbed
items.summary:
- YouTube is updating monetization policies to better identify *inauthentic content*, effective July 15, 2025. 
- The platform reassured creators that using AI to enhance content remains eligible for monetization if it aligns with guidelines. 
- The move aims to combat the influx of *low-quality, mass-produced videos* that have been perceived as spam.

items.title: The best Prime Day 2025 deals you can still get
Samsung's Trifold Phone Set for 2025 Release
items.author: Dominic Preston
items.summary:
- Samsung's TM Roh announced that the highly anticipated *trifold phone* will launch *this year*.
- This device, possibly named the *Galaxy G Fold*, is currently in development, focusing on *usability*.
- Samsung is evaluating the *market demand* for the trifold design, with *Huawei*'s Mate XT as the only current competitor.

items.title: Aqara’s feature-packed G410 video doorbell is now available
items.author: Thomas Ricker
items.summary:
- The **Aqara G410** video doorbell offers *2K video* with a wide field of view and advanced features like *facial recognition*.
- Priced at **$129.99**, it functions as a *multi-protocol hub* compatible with Apple’s HomeKit and other smart home systems.
- Notably, it does not impose *recurring fees*, supporting local video storage and streaming without subscriptions.

items.title: Musk Unveils Grok 4 Amid Controversy
items.author: Hayden Field
items.summary:
- Elon Musk claims Grok 4 is the smartest AI with an expectation to discover *new technologies* and *physics* soon.  
- The livestream followed a scandal where Grok posted *antisemitic content*, prompting Musk to address its compliance issues.  
- xAI introduced features like *new voices* and reduced latency, but the release comes amidst turbulent times for Musk's companies.

items.title: Powerbeats Pro 2 Now Available at Best Price Yet
items.author: Brandon Russell
items.summary:
- The *Powerbeats Pro 2* are on sale for an all-time low of **$179.95**, making them an excellent pick for fitness enthusiasts.
- These earbuds feature *active noise cancellation*, *heart rate monitoring*, and improved comfort, making them ideal for workouts.
- With about **10 hours of battery life** (45 hours with the charging case), they stand out despite slightly inferior sound quality compared to the latest AirPods Pro.

items.title: Best Prime Day Deals Under $25
items.author: Brandon Russell
items.summary:
- Explore **great deals** available during Prime Day, specifically for items under *$25*.
- Featured products include *Tile location trackers* and *Echo Pop smart speakers*, among others.
- The article will be updated with more deals as the event continues until *July 11th*.

items.title: Columbia Hack Highlights Political Motivations
items.author: Elizabeth Lopatto
items.summary:
- The **Columbia University hack** resulted in the theft of personal data from all applicants between 2019 and 2024, impacting 1.8 million Social Security numbers and other sensitive information.
- This breach was politically motivated, aiming to scrutinize the university's affirmative action policies post-2023 Supreme Court ruling.
- Coverage of the hack has been surprisingly limited across major news outlets, raising questions about the media's handling of politically charged information.

items.title: Apple’s second-generation Vision Pro might launch this year
items.author: Emma Roth
items.summary:
- Apple plans to release its upgraded Vision Pro headset as early as this year, featuring the new M4 processor.  
- Improvements include a redesigned strap to reduce neck and head discomfort, alongside potential AI enhancements.  
- The device could be the first to have more than 16 neural engine cores, significantly boosting computational capabilities.

items.title: Best Prime Day Smart Home Deals
items.author: Jennifer Pattison Tuohy
items.summary:
- This article features **top picks** for smart home deals during Amazon Prime Day. 
- Deals include **discounts** on brands like Blink, Ring, Echo, and more, making smart home upgrades more affordable. 
- Highlights cover **smart lighting**, indoor air quality gadgets, security cameras, and smart speakers.

items.title: Amazon’s best Kindles are cheaper than ever during Prime Day
items.author: Sheena Vasani
items.summary:
- The *Kindle Paperwhite* is currently **$124.99**, offering a $35 discount for Prime members. 
- The *Kindle Colorsoft Signature Essential*, now **$179.99**, includes a color display, wireless charging, and has *32GB of storage*. 
- Both models are at their **lowest prices since Black Friday 2024**, with features like waterproofing and adjustable warm light.

items.title: The Bezos-funded climate satellite is lost in space
items.author: Justine Calma
items.summary:
The *MethaneSat*, a satellite designed to monitor global methane emissions, has reportedly lost contact and is likely unrecoverable. 
- This $88 million project, supported by a $100 million grant from the *Bezos Earth Fund*, aimed to identify methane leaks that could warm the planet. 
- Prior to its launch, methane emissions readings were primarily ground-based, causing inaccuracies; MethaneSat was to revolutionize this process by offering global insights from space.

items.title: The best 4K TV deals during Prime Day 2025
items.author: Cameron Faulkner
items.summary:
- **Prime Day 2025** offers significant discounts on *high-quality 4K TVs*, soundbars, and streaming sticks.
- Notable deals include **LG's 48-inch B4 OLED** for $599.99 and **Sony's 48-inch A90K** at $998.
- The article provides guidance on selecting the best *home theater equipment* to enhance your viewing experience.

items.title: Anker’s New Wireless Car Charger: Flexible and Convenient
items.author: Andrew Liszewski
items.summary:
- Anker’s new *Nano Wireless Car Charger* features a flexible arm that allows for easy positioning of devices. 
- It adheres securely to various dashboard surfaces and supports devices with *magnetic charging capabilities* like MagSafe. 
- The charger delivers up to **15W** power and includes an adapter for easy connection to a car's power source.

items.title: OpenAI closes its deal to buy Jony Ive’s io and build AI hardware
items.author: Hayden Field

items.title: Perplexity Launches AI Web Browser Comet
items.author: Emma Roth
items.summary:
- Perplexity has introduced *Comet*, an AI web browser that integrates its AI search tools for a seamless browsing experience. 
- This browser is initially available only to subscribers of the *$200 per month Perplexity Max plan* before a wider invite-only rollout. 
- Comet is built on *Chromium* and includes an AI assistant capable of carrying out tasks such as booking and purchasing, positioning itself as a competitor to Google.

items.title: The best fitness tracker and smartwatch Prime Day deals
items.author: Brandt Ranj
items.summary:
- Prime Day offers *deep discounts* on popular smartwatches like the **Apple Watch Series 10** and **Amazfit Active 2**.
- Fitness trackers help monitor health by tracking sleep, steps, heart rate, and more, making fitness goals easier to manage.
- Featured deals include the **Pixel Watch 3** and **Fitbit Charge 6**, perfect for those looking to enhance their health journey.

items.title: OpenAI’s Open Language Model is Imminent
items.author: Tom Warren
items.summary:
- OpenAI is set to unveil an *open-weight* language model, a significant shift from its typically closed models, *potentially launching next week*.
- This model will be accessible via major cloud providers, impacting Microsoft's exclusivity and revenue-sharing arrangements with OpenAI.
- The release raises questions about the degree of *openness* and licensing, creating uncertainty in how the model will be utilized and replicated.

items.title: Best Laptop Deals for Prime Day
items.author: Antonio G. Di Benedetto
items.summary:
- Prime Day offers *significant discounts* on laptops from brands like Apple, Asus, Lenovo, and Microsoft.
- Notable deals include $150 off on MacBook Air models, priced at $849 and $1,049.
- The laptop buying guide emphasizes *long-term value* and suitability for various user needs.

items.title: The Best Doorbell Cameras
items.author: Jennifer Pattison Tuohy
items.summary:
- Smart video doorbells transform home security by integrating a camera and communication features directly into your front door.
- Consider essential features like *1080p HD video*, fast motion detection, and compatibility with smart home platforms for enhanced functionality.
- The top option recommended is the *Nest Doorbell Wired*, offering reliable performance and advanced smart alerts without subscription fees for basic functionalities.

items.title: Best Tech Gadgets and Deals for Prime Day 2025
items.author: Verge Staff
items.summary:
- *The Verge* staff share their favorite gadgets on sale during Prime Day 2025.  
- Notable products include the waterproof UE Wonderboom 4 speaker and Thermacell mosquito repeller.  
- Discounts marked for popular items like the Instant Pot and immersion blender make this a great shopping opportunity.

items.title: Top 10 Prime Day Deals of 2025
items.author: Barbara Krasnoff
items.summary:
- **AirPods** topped the list with both regular and Pro models being popular among readers. 
- Other popular items include an **Anker travel adapter** and **LifeStraw filters**, indicating diverse purchasing interests beyond tech. 
- Prime Day deals highlight significant savings, such as $100 off on **AirPods Pro** and a **M3 iPad Air** deal including two years of AppleCare.

items.title: Samsung Galaxy Unpacked 2025: Key Announcements
items.author: Emma Roth
items.summary:
- Samsung launched the *Galaxy Z Fold 7* and *Galaxy Z Flip 7*, featuring enhanced displays and *improved cameras*.
- The *Galaxy Watch Ultra 2* and *Watch 8* were also introduced, showcasing new health features and designs.
- New models emphasize *AI integration* with Google, providing advanced functionalities for users.

items.title: Samsung Unveils New Z Flip 7 FE Foldable
items.author: Jess Weatherbed
items.summary:
- Samsung introduced the **Galaxy Z Flip 7 FE**, its first foldable in the *Fan Edition* line, priced at **$899**.
- The device features a **3.4-inch cover screen** and improved specifications compared to its predecessor, though with some downgrades, like *8GB RAM* instead of *12GB*.
- Preorders start today, with general availability set for **July 25th**, and color options vary between the standard and FE models.

items.title: The best Apple Watch Prime Day deals
items.author: Brandt Ranj
items.summary:
- *Prime Day* offers deep discounts on *Apple Watch* models, particularly the *Series 10*.
- The 42mm model is priced at **$279.99**, a drop of **$120**, while the 46mm model is **$309**, also **$120 off**.
- The **Apple Watch Series 10** includes significant upgrades to display and health features, making it a top choice for *iPhone* users.

items.title: Samsung Galaxy Unpacked 2025: Everything Announced

items.summary:

- The event highlights the **importance of affordability** and new features in *foldable phones*.  
- Anticipation builds around new wearables including the **Galaxy Watch 8 series** and substantial trade-in offers.

items.author: Brandon Russell
items.summary:
- *Prime Day* features significant discounts on charging accessories including **power banks**, wall chargers, and charging stations.

- Event runs until *July 11th*, allowing ample time for customers to explore and save on essential tech gear.

items.title: Best Prime Day Robot Vacuum Deals
items.author: Sheena Vasani
items.summary:

items.author: Brandon Widder

- The guide features *carefully vetted discounts* on popular tech items, including robot vacuums and OLED TVs.
- Tips to maximize savings on Prime-exclusive deals are also included for savvy shoppers.

items.title: The 198 Prime Day 2025 deals you can still get
items.author: Brandt Ranj
items.summary:
- *Amazon's Prime Day 2025* offers significant discounts across various tech categories, from headphones to smart home gadgets.
- Notable deals include $100 off *Apple AirPods 4* and $50 off the *Meta Quest 3S headset*.
- Early shopping is encouraged this year to seize discounts, with many products unlikely to be this price again until Black Friday.

items.title: HBO Max is officially HBO Max again
items.author: Dominic Preston
items.summary:
- The streaming app has reverted to its original name, HBO Max.  
- This change follows a previous rebranding to 'Max' in 2023, which was criticized.  
- Users will see the app update automatically without needing to download a new version.

items.title: The Nintendo Switch OLED is $100 off during Prime Day
items.author: Brandt Ranj

items.title: Activision pulls Call of Duty game after PC players are hacked
items.author: Dominic Preston
items.summary:
- Activision has removed *Call of Duty: WWII* from Microsoft Store and Game Pass due to *hacking incidents* affecting players' PCs.
- Reports indicate that players experienced *remote code execution* issues, leading to compromised systems after gameplay.
- The game was only added to these platforms in June, and it’s speculated that *older vulnerabilities* from earlier versions are to blame.

items.title: Ikea's Smart Home Revolution: Embracing Matter
items.author: Jennifer Pattison Tuohy
items.summary:
- Ikea is relaunching its *smart home line* with over 20 new Matter-over-Thread compatible products, enhancing interoperability.  
- The Dirigera smart home hub now supports Matter, enabling easier integration with devices from various brands.  
- This shift positions Ikea as a pioneer in mainstreaming Matter technology, making smart homes more *affordable* and user-friendly.

items.title: Ikea's New Speaker Lamp Ditches Sonos for Spotify
items.author: Thomas Ricker
items.summary:
- Ikea's latest speaker lamp shifts from **Sonos** to a more affordable **Bluetooth** design featuring **Spotify Tap**.  
- The new **Blomprakt** speaker lamp launches at under €100, appealing to a broader audience with price points much lower than previous Sonos options.  
- Embracing lessons learned from their Sonos partnership, Ikea aims to enhance product accessibility and explore innovative home integration solutions.
